Name: viral meningitis
Definition: A meningitis that has_material_basis_in a viral infection.

Name: obsolete Mumps virus encephalitis
Definition: A Mumps virus infectious disease that results_in inflammation located_in brain

Name: obsolete Mumps virus pancreatitis
Definition: A Mumps virus infectious disease that results_in inflammation located_in pancreas

Name: chronic meningitis
Definition: A pneumoconiosis that results_in humans that also have rheumatoid arthritis.

Name: obsolete subchronic latent schizophrenia
Definition: A pneumoconiosis that results_in humans that also have rheumatoid arthritis.

Name: obsolete latent schizophrenia
Definition: A pneumoconiosis that results_in humans that also have rheumatoid arthritis.

Name: fungal meningitis
Definition: A meningitis that has_material_basis_in a fungal infection.

Name: arachnoiditis
Definition: A viral infectious disease that results in infection located in brain

Name: aseptic meningitis
Definition: A meningitis that is characterized by meningeal inflammation not caused by an identifiable bacterial pathogen in the cerebrospinal fluid. A large majority of them are caused by enteroviruses.

Name: bacterial meningitis
Definition: A meningitis that has_material_basis_in a bacterial infection.
